auth.aboutPlaceHolder: Website developer. I learned the languages HTML5-CSS3-JAVASCRIPT-JQUERY-BOOTSTRAP-PHP-MYSQL-AJAX-JSON-API. I have more than 50 clients with a 5-star rating on various freelance platforms. I have experience in designing and developing websites for more than 5 years and I have worked on all... Types of web projects (electronic stores - informational sites - business fairs - educational sites - employment sites). We have worked with various types of companies and bodies (small companies - large companies - government bodies). I can convert PSD, XD, or Figma designs into interactive websites only. Take a look at my work and feel free to contact me :)

addService.titleHint: Choose a short and concise title that describes the service, it will be used in the search engine results
addService.serviceDescriptionHint: Write a unique description of the service in clear, error-free language, explaining in detail what the customer will get when they purchase the service.
addService.daysHint: The service will be canceled if it is not delivered on time.
addService.galleryHint: Add an image that expresses the service, in addition to at least three exclusive examples through which the buyer gets to know your work style and skills.
addService.imagesHint: Scale: 343x257 px, Aspect Ratio: 4:3, Max Size: 5 MB, Allowed: 10 files.
addService.instructionsHint: The information you need from the buyer to implement the service. This information appears only after you purchase the service.
addService.addMoreDevelopmentHint: The service improvements provided are only optional and cannot be forced upon the buyer to request them.
addService.moreDevPricePlaceholder: Add 5 USD to the service price
